name: Sudoku - Classic Brain Game
description:
Sudoku is an extremely popular math game. Millions of people purchase a sudoku puzzle book everyday in the store and enjoy the puzzles from the comfort of their homes. It can end up costing a lot of money to enjoy these puzzles if you really like them.

That's why we created Sudoku - Classic Brain Game, so that you could enjoy thousands of puzzles in any difficulty you feel comfortable with 100% for free! Now you can enjoy the game you love from home or anywhere you wish!

Features:
- Thousands of brain-training sudoku puzzles
- 4 Difficulties: Easy, Medium, Hard & Expert
- Undo moves
- Erase mistakes made in the past
- Get hints for when you're stuck
- 100% free to play!
